inclusion.criterion: histologically proven or imaging suggestive of recurrent disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to understand and willingness to sign a written informed consent document
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: greater than or equal to 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no more than two prior disease relapses
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: tumor tissue available for review to confirm histological diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: prior bevacizumab use for tumor treatment
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is experiencing progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention.
